Articles.Content:
Career friendly Duna explorer ship. Efficient design. Lots of snacks and a teeny tiny probe lander for the more peculiarly minded space explorers.

Happy launchings. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Cryogenic engines pack is the only mod you need for this craft.

More in depth description in the link below.

![EoCr97F.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/EoCr97F.jpg)

[see Duna Explorer Mk1 on KerbalX.com](http://kerbalx.com/iVG/Duna-Explorer-Mk1)
Very neat design and cost effective too i like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you! Everything worked perfectly from the first try on my stream the other day. Check back in a few minutes, I'm uploading my craft from yesterday's mission to Dres ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Stay tuned!
